alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Madison; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 2:21PM CDT until March 30 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Central Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Eastern Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Western Warren County in west central Mississippi... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 221 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bakers to Larto, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Bakers around 225 PM CDT. Monterey and Tendal around 235 PM CDT. Deer Park and Afton around 245 PM CDT. Tallulah and Mansford around 250 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mound, Gilbert, Sicily Island, Delta, Ridgecrest and Richmond. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
